{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Intel_PRO/Wireless_2011B_LAN_PCI_Adapter |wikipedia = |brand = Intel |model = WPCI2011B |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = B11 |series = |if = PCI |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 1260 |device_id = 3873 |subvendor_id = 8086 |subdevice_id = 2510 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = J3OM3AWEB56GA |icid = |boardid = 200-0903-001 |ecc_id = |oui = 00:05:3C |chip1 = Intersil;ISL3874; |chip2 = Intersil;ISL3685; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL, RP-SMA (reverse threaded) |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Xircom |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = EoL |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/26/2001 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Malaysia |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "200-0903-001 REV 3" is silkscreened on the back of the Mini PCI card in the FCC internal photos. This card is a [[Intel PRO/Wireless 2011b LAN 3A Mini PCI Adapter]] (M3AWEB) on a Mini PCI -> PCI adapter. :The same Mini PCI -> PCI adapter appears to be used for the [[Intel PRO/Wireless 5000 LAN PCI Adapter]]. Subsystems in the Intel driver include.. *8086:2510 ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1260/3873/80862510 in the PCI ID repository] as ''M3AWEB Wireless 802.11b MiniPCI Adapter'', :may have been used in one revision of the [http://lists.freedesktop.org/archives/xorg/2007-July/025929.html Electrovaya Scribbler tablet PC]) *8086:2513 ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1260/3873/80862513 in the PCI ID repository] as ''Wireless 802.11b MiniPCI Adapter'') *8086:2515 *8086:2516 *8086:2517 There is also an different subsystem (8086:2511) in the [[Intel]] drivers for :the '''Intel PRO/Wireless 2011b LAN 3B Mini PCI Adapter''' 
Intel PRO/Wireless 2011b LAN 3A Mini PCI Adapter	8086:2510
Intel PRO/Wireless 2011b LAN 3B Mini PCI Adapter	8086:2511
High Rate Wireless LAN Mini PCI Adapter with Modem II	8086:2513
Intel PRO/Wireless 2011b LAN 3A Mini PCI Adapter	8086:2514
Intel PRO/Wireless 2011b LAN 3A Mini PCI Adapter	8086:2515
Intel PRO/Wireless 2011b LAN 3A Mini PCI Adapter	8086:2516
Intel PRO/Wireless 2011b LAN 3A Mini PCI Adapter	8086:2517
